mil6.2.10:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil6.2.10:0.4_0: and this is how to be set aside.
mil6.2.10:1.1_0: “Hold on, Nāgadatta, what’s the sun, so that it doesn’t occur?”
mil6.2.10:1.2_0: “Great king, that dust and dirt have been shown off by dust and dirt in the sky. It’s wounded with dust and dirt, and the sun, fire in the sky above that.
mil6.2.10:2.1_0: And when the earth is extinguished between the sky and the earth is clear and cloudless. It’s rain is rid of dust and dirt, and the sun came up,
mil6.2.10:2.2_0: That’s why he came out of the sunn hemp cloth, but not because of the hot springs.”
mil6.2.10:2.3_0: “Your Majesty, sir, is all practicing the way of mortification. I love a gumt to me.”
mil6.2.10:3.1_0: He is practicing the tenth section.
mil6.2.10:4.1_0: The second sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
mil6.2.10:5.1_0: and the ten questions on this exposition of the teaching.
